posts.post_content:
I need to sell a handful of these.  For now all are available but once I sell some, I will probably pull back a few of my favorites.  But figured I'd show all of my Napoleons in case I can help anyone who has been searching for a specific one for a long time.

Prices are all ppff but you can do pp goods if you want to, just add 3.5%.  I have to collect ST in WA state.

Posting some scans here, but please shoot me a message if you'd like to see any scans.
